menu.name: Bosphorus Croissant
menu.description: A flaky French croissant infused with Turkish tahini and pekmez, creating the perfect harmony of east and west.

menu.name: Manti Ratatouille
menu.description: Delicate Turkish dumplings filled with spiced beef, served on a bed of Provençal-style ratatouille.

menu.name: Lamb Cassoulet Kebab
menu.description: Slow-cooked lamb cassoulet meets char-grilled kebab for an unforgettable culinary experience.

menu.name: Baklava Mille-Feuille
menu.description: The buttery layers of mille-feuille meet the nutty sweetness of Turkish baklava for a dessert masterpiece.

menu.name: Eiffel Ayran
menu.description: A refreshing Turkish yogurt drink with a hint of lavender, inspired by the French countryside.

menu.name: Beyoglu Crème Brûlée
menu.description: Classic French crème brûlée infused with aromatic Turkish coffee for a bold twist.

menu.name: Istanbul Quiche
menu.description: A hearty quiche featuring Turkish sucuk sausage and creamy feta cheese.

menu.name: Toulouse Dolma
menu.description: Grape leaves stuffed with rice, herbs, and confit duck for a rich Mediterranean twist.

menu.name: Bouillabaisse Tarhana
menu.description: A fusion of French seafood soup with Turkish tarhana, blending bold and tangy flavors.

menu.name: Meze Éclair
menu.description: Savoury éclairs filled with roasted eggplant and creamy labneh, topped with za'atar.

menu.name: Galata Escargot
menu.description: Traditional French escargots served with a Turkish garlic-yogurt dipping sauce.

menu.name: Pide Provençale
menu.description: A Turkish flatbread topped with olives, goat cheese, and sun-dried tomatoes.

menu.name: Adana Crêpe
menu.description: Savory crêpes filled with spiced lamb from the Adana region, served with mint yogurt.

menu.name: Aegean Tart
menu.description: A flaky tart filled with Turkish olives, French Gruyère, and fresh rosemary.

menu.name: Ottoman Soufflé
menu.description: Rich chocolate soufflé spiced with a hint of cinnamon and Turkish chili flakes.

menu.name: Brioche Köfte
menu.description: Juicy Turkish köfte served on a soft French brioche bun with sumac onions.

menu.name: Antakya Ratatouille
menu.description: Ratatouille with a Turkish twist, featuring Antakya’s signature pomegranate molasses.

menu.name: Côte d'Azur Baklava
menu.description: Baklava layered with figs and a touch of French lavender honey.

menu.name: Foie Gras Börek
menu.description: Crispy Turkish börek filled with rich foie gras and caramelized onions.

menu.name: Simit Tartine
menu.description: Traditional Turkish sesame bagel topped with creamy French brie and fig jam.

drinks.name: Lavender Lemonade
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of lemonade with a hint of lavender, perfect for any meal.

drinks.name: Turkish Coffee Martini
drinks.description: A bold martini combining Turkish coffee and smooth French vodka.

drinks.name: Pomegranate Kir Royale
drinks.description: A sparkling cocktail of champagne and tart Turkish pomegranate juice.

drinks.name: Minty Ayran Cooler
drinks.description: A twist on classic ayran with mint leaves and a dash of lime.

drinks.name: Rosewater Fizz
drinks.description: A delicate balance of rosewater and sparkling lemonade.

drinks.name: Chai Latte Française
drinks.description: Turkish black tea steeped with French spices and topped with frothy milk.

drinks.name: Rakı Sour
drinks.description: A unique cocktail blending Turkish rakı with lemon and a hint of anise.

drinks.name: Lavender Mint Iced Tea
drinks.description: A soothing iced tea brewed with lavender and fresh mint leaves.

drinks.name: Iced Turkish Coffee
drinks.description: A refreshing chilled version of traditional Turkish coffee.

drinks.name: Bosphorus Breeze
drinks.description: A cool mocktail with cucumber, lemon, and a touch of elderflower.
